body.name: JJOO Paring Knives, Stainless Steel Paring Knife Set with Cover, 3.6 inch Pairing knife, Ultra-Sharp Small Kitchen Knife, Great for Fruit and Vegetable, Dishwasher Safe (Multi Colors)

features: 1. Ultra-Sharp Stainless Steel Blades: Our paring knives feature 3.6-inch blades made from high-quality stainless steel, ensuring sharpness and durability. Experience precise cuts, effortless slicing, and consistent peeling, this paring knife set making your kitchen tasks a breeze.

2. Vibrant and Organized: The paring knife set of 4 includes four vibrant colors - orange, yellow, pink, and green. Not just for style, but for functionality. Assign each color to a specific task or ingredient, promoting a systematic and organized kitchen environment. This color-coded paring knife could ensuring your kitchen is both stylish and safe.

3. Comfortable and Ergonomic Design: Our pairing knife are crafted with ergonomic plastic handles, providing a comfortable and secure grip. The carefully designed handles of this kitchen knives reduce hand fatigue, allowing you to enjoy extended periods of use without discomfort. The balanced weight of this fruit knife distribution ensures optimal control for precise cutting.

4. Protective Knife Sheaths: Each knife comes with a matching protective sheath. This not only ensures safe storage and preserves the sharpness of the blades but also allows for easy access. The paring knife with cover are designed for convenience, making the knives readily available while keeping them securely stored when not in use.

5. Versatile for All Skill Levels: Whether you're a professional chef or a home cook, our paring knives set is designed to meet your needs. The versatility of these vegetable knife makes them ideal for various kitchen tasks. From intricate culinary creations to everyday meal preparation, our paring knives set of 4 are a valuable addition to kitchens of all skill levels.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cheerful colors make them easy to find in a large box of knives
reviews.reviewText: Cut nicely and do all that I expect a basic paring knife to do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value, decent knives.
reviews.reviewText: These are a decent value. The blades seem like good quality, and are very sharp. My normal test for knives after sharpening them is to cut a piece of paper while holding it and bringing the knife down vertically. These cut through the paper like butter.Can't beat the price on these for 4 sharp pairing knives. The finish on the blade seems to be decent quality also. Each knife has a hole for hanging also.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fine small knives
reviews.reviewText: These JJOO paring knives are fairly typical stamped stainless steel inexpensive knives. Out of the box, they are pretty sharp if slightly rough edged. Probably will take some cleanup with a knife sharpener sooner rather than later. The blades are hollow ground so they'll stay sharp a little longer. Blades are quite stiff for this type of knife, with sheepsfoot/mini-santoku shaped ends. Being not pointed at all, those ends are far more useful for slicing and peeling than for poking holes. But for those who do small chopping and slicing jobs with a paring knife as I do, these are the perfect blade shape.As with any of this style of knives, the plastic handle is simply molded around the blade. There is no bolster. These seem reasonably well made, with tighly molded wrenches. The handles are bright distinctive colors, very easy to find in a drawer or color code to avoid contamination. Each knife comes with a blade protector in matching color. The protectors clip on to the blades very securely.For the price, these are very nice little knives.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great everyday use set. The quality of the materials is good and sold the handle are secure to the blades and have anice balanced feell when using . the blades are extremely sharp and the colors are a nice touch . The oofer a high quality cut , feel and look to them while still being 100% functional at the same time . This is a good reliable set that cannot be beat for the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These knives are both form and function. There are 4 little paring knives in beautiful colors. This is the size of knife that is the most useful for kitchen tasks. I like that the colors are the same / complementary to the knife sets with larger ceramic knives. Everything goes together. They can also be put in the dishwasher, which is super great and convenient.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great knives at a great price
reviews.reviewText: I'm very impressed with the sharpness and overall quality of these knives. And I especially like that each knife comes with its own sheath for safety. Nice colors too, if that's important to you. Only time will tell if the sharpness holds up with use. (A problem for most inexpensive knives.) For the price, they're very hard to beat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars 3.6 inch Pairing Knife Set with Covers
reviews.reviewText: This is a set of 4 Very Sharp Paring Knives with Covers. These knives are 3.6" long. Very Sharp! Careful not to cut yourself. Good Knives.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Basic solid knife set
reviews.reviewText: Tremendous value for what you get here. It would cost significantly more in store to find anything comparable; if at all.These are basic quality knives; they probably won't last a long time, but they aren't meant to be your forever knives. Pick up 2 sets and be good to go for a long time.
